channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Why did Cierra leave 'Love Island USA'? How to stream tonight, cast
item.description: Thelast week of "Love Island USA" season sevenis bringing back some classic "Love Island" challenges and rewards.

item.title: Florida high school football: When does practice, season start?
item.description: Florida high school footballseason is right around the corner with summer break soon to give way to fall camp, practices and more preseason gridiron action.

item.title: Why Big Ten desperately wants to rig College Football Playoff
item.description: At leastBig Tencommissioner Tony Petitti dropped any pretense that his vision for the future format of theCollege Football Playoffwould be a boon for anyone other than his conference.

item.title: From a frequent flyer: 10 best Prime Day travel deals I love ✈️
item.description: When I'm not shopping, I'm traveling; when I'm not traveling, I'm shopping. And somewhere in the middle of my endless buying sprees and jaunts abroad, I'm shopping for travel essentials ahead of mynext getaway—a fun little overlap of interests, if you will.

item.title: This rare 20% Dyson Airwrap deal is live for Prime Day 2025
item.description: If you’ve been eyeing aDyson Airwrap, now’s the time to make your move. As part ofAmazon Prime Day 2025, this cult-favorite hair styling tool is 20% off, a rare discount on one of the most sought-after beauty devices on the market.

item.title: New Prime Day deals dropped for July 9: Shop the best picks here
item.description: Amazon Prime Day 2025 is in full swing, and as we hit the second day of the four-day mega sale, new deals are dropping across every category, fromtechand home to fashion, beauty and beyond.

item.title: Football Recruiting 2026: Florida high school summer…
Texas flooding: Could it happen here? Florida is most…
item.description: Floridalacks the hilly topography that supercharged torrential rain into deadly inundations in Central Texas over the July Fourth weekend, but ahost of factorsmake the Sunshine State themost flood-proneof any other.

item.title: Amazon Prime Day deals on hurricane kit items…
item.description: Today marks the second day of Amazon’s biggest online shopping sale of the year.Amazon Prime Daystarted as a one-day sales event in 2015 to celebrate the company’s 20th anniversary.
